H0.text: The Qur'an (or Quran, Kuran, Koran, Coran or al-Qur'an - literally 'the recitation') is the religious text of which religion. Judaism

H1.text: The Qur'an (or Quran, Kuran, Koran, Coran or al-Qur'an - literally 'the recitation') is the religious text of which religion. Christianity

H2.text: The Qur'an (or Quran, Kuran, Koran, Coran or al-Qur'an - literally 'the recitation') is the religious text of which religion. Buddhism

H3.text: The Qur'an (or Quran, Kuran, Koran, Coran or al-Qur'an - literally 'the recitation') is the religious text of which religion. إسلام

A4.text: The Quran is the central religious text of Islam, believed by Muslims to be a revelation directly from God (Allāh).
